category.name: Category name
category.description_instructions: Enter a brief description of the category. This field accepts basic Markdown.

reading_group.name: Group Name
reading_group.privacy_instructions: Annotations in public groups can be viewed by everyone. Annotations in private groups can only be viewed by group members. In anonymous groups, comments are private and only the group creator can see the identity of each annotation's author.
reading_group.invitation_code_instructions: Users can enter the invitation code on the "Manage Reading Groups" page to join this group. You may change this code at any time, but previous codes will no longer work
reading_group.invitation_url_instructions: The URL above is based on the invitation code. Readers can also join the group by visiting this URL.
reading_group.course_instructions: Course information is used for internal tracking and reporting purposes.
reading_group.notifications_instructions: Email me when anyone joins this group

reading_group_member.title: Edit Group Member
reading_group_member.name: Member Name
reading_group_member.role_instructions: Members can see group annotations and annotate within the group. Moderators can manage members and update group settings.
reading_group_member.label: Label
reading_group_member.label_instructions: Labels are used to describe specific members within the group and appear next to the name in the membership list.
reading_group_member.annotation_style_instructions: Annotation styles will appear in the Manifold reading interface and can be used to call differentiate a user's annotations from other annotations in the reading group.
reading_group_member.style_preview: This is what your selected annotation style will look like when viewed in the reader. Font styling and sizing may be different depending on the settings in your visibility control panel.

manage_group.title: Manage Group:
manage_group.instructions: Edit the Home Page or the settings for your Reading Group.

join_group.title: Join a group:
join_group.instructions: To join a group, enter the code and select Join.

duplicate.label: Duplicate
duplicate.heading: Create a copy of {{group}}
duplicate.instructions: This will create a copy of your reading group. Once copied, you will need to add users to the group.

notifications.title: Notification Settings
notifications.instructions: Edit your email notifications and subscriptions.
